files.patch:
@@ -208,0 +208,14 @@
+  # Setup libiconv flags and library
+  if test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_OS" != "xwindows"; then
+    ICONV_CFLAGS=
+    ICONV_LDFLAGS=
+    ICONV_LIBS=-liconv
+  else
+    ICONV_CFLAGS=
+    ICONV_LDFLAGS=
+    ICONV_LIBS=
+  fi
+  AC_SUBST(ICONV_CFLAGS)
+  AC_SUBST(ICONV_LDFLAGS)
+  AC_SUBST(ICONV_LIBS)
+

@@ -232,0 +232,2 @@
+      CFLAGS_aix := $(ICONV_CFLAGS), \
+      CFLAGS_macosx := $(ICONV_CFLAGS), \
@@ -234,0 +236,2 @@
+      CXXFLAGS_aix := $(ICONV_CFLAGS), \
+      CXXFLAGS_macosx := $(ICONV_CFLAGS), \
@@ -260,0 +264,2 @@
+      LDFLAGS_aix := $(ICONV_LDFLAGS), \
+      LDFLAGS_macosx := $(ICONV_LDFLAGS), \
@@ -265,1 +271,1 @@
-      LIBS_macosx := -liconv \
+      LIBS_macosx := $(ICONV_LIBS) \
@@ -271,1 +277,1 @@
-      LIBS_aix := $(LIBDL) -liconv $(X_LIBS) -lX11 -lXext, \
+      LIBS_aix := $(LIBDL) $(ICONV_LIBS) $(X_LIBS) -lX11 -lXext, \

@@ -38,0 +38,2 @@
+    CFLAGS_aix := $(ICONV_CFLAGS), \
+    CFLAGS_macosx := $(ICONV_CFLAGS), \
@@ -41,0 +43,2 @@
+    LDFLAGS_aix := $(ICONV_LDFLAGS), \
+    LDFLAGS_macosx := $(ICONV_LDFLAGS), \
@@ -44,2 +48,2 @@
-    LIBS_aix := $(LIBDL) -liconv, \
-    LIBS_macosx := -liconv \
+    LIBS_aix := $(LIBDL) $(ICONV_LIBS), \
+    LIBS_macosx := $(ICONV_LIBS) \

@@ -57,0 +57,2 @@
+    CFLAGS_aix := $(ICONV_CFLAGS), \
+    CFLAGS_macosx := $(ICONV_CFLAGS), \
@@ -71,0 +73,2 @@
+    LDFLAGS_aix := $(ICONV_LDFLAGS), \
+    LDFLAGS_macosx := $(ICONV_LDFLAGS), \
@@ -77,2 +81,2 @@
-    LIBS_macosx := -liconv, \
-    LIBS_aix := -liconv, \
+    LIBS_macosx := $(ICONV_LIBS), \
+    LIBS_aix := $(ICONV_LIBS), \
